product_name: REI Digital Alarm Clock with Flashlight
long_description: The compact, all-in-one REI Digital alarm clock with built-in LED flashlight features a large display with backlight, loud alarm with eight tone choices, a 5-min. snooze and other handy features. Large display with backlight is easy to read; superbright LED flashlight is built in to the base. Loud 110dB alarm has eight different alarm tones to choose from and a 5-min. snooze feature. Displays time, date, day of week and the temperature; also includes birthday reminders and a stopwatch. 4 AAA batteries are sold separately.
short_description: The compact, all-in-one REI Digital alarm clock with built-in LED flashlight features a large display with backlight, loud alarm with eight tone choices, a 5-min. snooze and other handy features.
